Title: Félicité
Writer: Alain Gomis (screenplay), Olivier Loustau (collaboration), Delphine Zingg (collaboration)
Actors: Véro Tshanda Beya Mputu, Gaetan Claudia, Papi Mpaka, Nadine Ndebo
Plot: Félicité sings in a bar in Kinshasa. When her 14-year-old son has a motorcycle accident, she goes on a frantic search through the streets of Kinshasa, a world of music and dreams. And her path crosses that of Tabu.
